text: Love this tee! True to size, soft fabric, and holds up well after many washes. Perfect basic.
Great quality for the price. Slightly oversized which I like. Color is true to photos.
Fabric is a bit thin and see-through in white. Size runs slightly large.
Perfect fit! So flattering and comfortable. True to size, great quality.
Love the style but runs a bit small. Size up if between sizes. Fabric is nice quality.
Fabric pills after a few wears. Not worth the price. Also runs small.
Classic trench, good quality for the price. Runs true to size. Love the beige color.
Fabric feels a bit cheap and wrinkles easily. But it's a good basic for the price.
Best jeans ever! Perfect fit, true to size, comfortable stretch. Worth every penny.
Great quality jeans. Runs slightly large in waist. Fabric is durable.
Love these pants! So comfortable and versatile. True to size, great fabric.
Fabric wrinkles a lot and is see-through in lighter colors. Cute style though.
Beautiful heels, very comfortable for all-day wear. True to size, great quality leather.
Love the style but runs slightly narrow. Size up if you have wide feet.
Cute boots but quality is just okay. Synthetic leather shows wear quickly.
Good value for the price. Comfortable, true to size. Perfect for everyday.
Stunning dress! Perfect fit, beautiful fabric. True to size, very flattering.
Love the style but fabric is delicate. Runs slightly small, consider sizing up.
Great backpack! Durable, spacious, and love that it's made from recycled materials.
Good quality backpack. Straps could be more padded but overall happy with purchase.
Nice blazer for the price. Fabric is decent, fits oversized as described.
Fabric wrinkles easily and feels a bit cheap. But it's a good basic blazer.
